description:
**You are a stealthy killer who lies in wait for the perfect moment to strike.** 
You may choose to **lie in wait** outside your target's house. 
 
You will attack one player who visits your target. 
**ALL PLAYERS VISITING YOUR TARGET WILL LEARN YOUR NAME.** 
 
*If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left, you will become a Mafioso.* 
 
**Goal:** Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

**You are a trauma patient that does not remember who they were.** 
Remember who you were like by **selecting a graveyard role**. 
 
When you choose a role, it will be revealed to **all the players in the game**. 
 
**Goal:** Remember who you were and complete that role's goal.

**You are a pyromaniac that wants to burn everyone.** 
You may **Douse** someone in gasoline or **ignite** Doused targets. 
 
**Select yourself** to ignite doused people, **dealing an Unstoppable attack**. 
You will douse **anybody that visits you** and **anyone that visits your target**. 
If you take no action, you will attempt to clean gasoline off yourself. 
 
**Goal:** Live to see everyone burn.

**You are an eavesdropper who uses information to keep people quiet.** 
Choose one person each night to **blackmail**. 
 
Blackmailed targets **cannot talk during the day**. 
You can read private whispers sent in `#town-square`. 
 
*If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left, you will become a Mafioso.* 
 
**Goal:** Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

**You are an ex-soldier who secretly makes a living by selling protection.** 
**Protect** a player from direct attacks at night. 
 
If your target is directly attacked or is the victim of a harmful visit, **you and the visitor will fight**. 
If you **successfully** protect someone, you can **still be Healed**. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are a corrupted investigator who gathers information for the Mafia.** 
**Check **one person for their **exact role** each night. 
 
*If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left, you will become a Mafioso.* 
 
**Goal:** Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

**You are a beautiful dancer working for organized crime.** 
**Distract** someone each night. 
 
Distraction **blocks your target** from using their role's night ability. 
 
*If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left, you will become a Mafioso.* 
 
**Goal:** Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

**You are a voodoo master who can control other people's actions.** 
You may choose to **Control** someone each night. 
 
Your victim will **know they are being controlled**. 
With the *Necronomicon*, your victim is dealt a Basic attack /  you gain Basic defense. 
You will **know the role of the player you control.** 
 
**Goal:** Kill all who would oppose the Coven.

**You are a divine protector whose skills in combat are unmatched.** 
**Protect** one person during the night. 
 
Protecting your target grants them **Powerful defense**. 
**You will know** if your target is attacked. 
You **attack one person** who **visits your target** on the same night. 
You **do not attack vampires**, but you do block their attacks. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are a master of disguise who can make people appear to be someone else.** 
**Disguise** a **mafia member** as a **non-mafia member** to alter their identity. 
 
The disguised Mafia member will appear to have **the same role** as the **non-Mafia member** to the Investigator and Sheriff. 
Your disguised Mafia member will **appear to be the other person** to a Lookout. 
When disguised as a Town member, **Mafia visits are disregarded by Spy**. 
 
*If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left, you will become a Mafioso.* 
 
**Goal:** Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

**You are a surgeon skilled in trauma care who secretly heals people.** 
**Heal** one person each night, granting them **Powerful defense**. 
 
You may only Heal yourself **once**. 
**You will know** if your target is attacked. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are a beautiful person skilled in distraction.** 
**Distract** someone each night. 
 
Distraction **blocks your target** from using their role's night ability. 
You **cannot** be role blocked. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are an obsessed lyncher who will stop at nothing to execute your target.** 
Trick the Town into **lynching** your target. 
 
Your target is **XXXXXXX**. 
If your target is **killed at night**, you will become a **Jester**. 
 
**Goal:** Get your target lynched at any cost.

**You are a crooked lawyer that replaces documents.** 
Choose a person and **rewrite their last will** at night. 
 
If your target dies, their last will is **replaced with your forgery** and their role will be shown as the **role you select to forge**. 
 
You may only perform **2 forgeries**. 
 
*If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left, you will become a Mafioso.* 
 
**Goal:** Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

**You are a skilled counterfeiter who manipulates information.** 
Choose someone to **frame** at night. 
 
If your target is investigated, **they will appear suspicious**. 
 
*If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left, you will become a Mafioso.* 
 
**Goal:** Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

**You are the leader of organized crime.** 
You may choose to **attack a player** each night. 
 
If there is a Mafioso, they will **attack the target** instead of you. 
You will **appear to be innocent** to the Sheriff. 
 
**Goal:** Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

**You are an Angel whose only goal is the protection of your charge.** 
Keep your target **alive**. 
 
Your target is **XXXXXXX**. 
If your target is killed, you will become a **Survivor** without any **bulletproof vests**. 
Twice a game, you may **Heal** and **Purge** your target. This may be **done from the grave**. Watching over a player **ignores Jail**. 
 
**Goal:** Keep your target alive until the end of the game.

**You are a spell slinger with a proficiency for hexes and curses.** 
You may choose to **Hex** a player each night. 
 
With the *Necronomicon*, you gain **Astral and Basic** attacks. 
Players are **still Hexed** when you have the Necronomicon. 
**WHEN ALL NON-COVEN MEMBERS ARE HEXED, THEY WILL BE DEALT AN UNSTOPPABLE ATTACK AT NIGHT.** 
 
**Goal:** Kill all who would oppose the Coven.

**You are a skilled hypnotist who can alter the perception of others.** 
You may sneak into a players house at night and **plant a memory**. 
 
A planted memory will **confuse the player**. 
Hypnotized players will see a **false message** in their house chat. 
 
*If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left, you will become a Mafioso.* 
 
**Goal:** Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

**You are a private eye who secretly gathers information.** 
**Investigate** one person each night for a **clue** to their role. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are a sanitation expert working for organized crime.** 
Choose a person to **clean** at night. 
 
If your target dies, their role and last will **won't be revealed** to the Town. 
Only **you** will see the **cleaned target's role** and last **will**. 
You may only perform **3 cleanings**. 
 
*If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left, you will become a Mafioso.* 
 
**Goal:** Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

**You are a prison guard who secretly detains suspects.** 
You may choose one person during the day to **Jail** for the night. 
 
You may **anonymously talk** with your prisoner. 
You can choose to **attack** your prisoner.
The jailed target **can't perform their night ability**. 
If you execute a Town member, you **forfeit** further executions. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are a crazed lunatic whose life goal is to be publicly executed.** 
Trick the Town into **voting against you**. 
 
If you are lynched, you will attack one of your **guilty** or **abstaining voters** the following night with an **Unstoppable attack**. 
 
**Goal:** Get yourself lynched by any means necessary.

**You are an unstoppable force that only gets stronger with each kill.** 
You may choose to **attack a player** on **full moon nights**. **(0 kills)** 
 
With each kill your powers **grow**. **(0 - 2 kills)** 
You may (now) attack **every night**. **(1st kill)** 
You (now) **kill all your target's visitors as well** when you attack. **(2nd kill)** 
You now **ignore all effects** that would **protect a player**. **(3rd kill)** 
 
You reach your **ultimate power** at **3** kills. 
 
**Goal:** Kill everyone who would oppose you.

**You are an eagle-eyed observer, camping outside houses to gain information.** 
**Watch** one person at night to **see who visits them**. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are a member of organized crime, trying to work your way to the top.** 
**Carry out** the Godfather's orders. 
 
You can **choose your attack** if the Godfather **doesn't give you orders**. 
If the Godfather dies, **you will become the next Godfather**. 
 
**Goal:** Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

**You are the leader of the town.** 
You may **reveal yourself** as the Mayor of the Town **during the day**. 
 
Once you have revealed yourself as Mayor, your vote counts **as 3 votes**. 
You **may not be Healed** once you have revealed yourself. 
Once revealed, **you can't whisper, or be whispered to.** 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are a secret psychic who talks with the dead.** 
You can **speak to the dead** each night you are alive. 
 
When dead, **speak to a living person** at night. 
You may only speak to a living person **once**. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are a snake haired monster with a gaze of stone.** 
You may choose to **Stone Gaze** all visitors at night. 
 
You may choose to stone gaze **3** times. 
With the *Necronomicon*, you may **visit players** and turn them to stone. 
 
**Goal:** Kill all who would oppose the Coven.

**You are an evil sorceress who has a grudge against the town.** 
You may **reanimate a dead player** and **use their ability** on a player. 
 
Create **zombies** from dead players who use their abilities on your **second target**. 
Each zombie can be used **once** before it rots. 
With the *Necronomicon*, select yourself to **summon a ghoul** to **Basic attack your target**. 
 
**Goal:** Kill all who would oppose the Coven.

**You are a horseman of the apocalypse who feeds off of disease.** 
You may choose to **Rampage** at a player's house each night, killing all visitors. 
 
You will attack **anyone who visits you** or **your target**. 
You **cannot be role blocked or controlled**. 
If you are jailed, you will **attack the Jailor**. 
 
**Goal:** Conquer the town, and then the world.

**You are a swashbuckler with an obsession for gold.** 
Choose a player to **plunder** each night. 
 
When you plunder a player, you will **duel the player** for their valuables. 
If the player defends against your attack, **you get no loot**. 
 
**Goal:** Successfully plunder two players.

**You are an acolyte of Pestilence who spreads disease among the town.** 
You may choose to **infect** a player with the **Plague** each night. 
 
All your **target's visitors** and players who **visit you** will be infected. 
Players **will not know** they have been infected. 
**WHEN ALL LIVING PLAYERS ARE INFECTED, YOU WILL BECOME PESTILENCE.** 
 
**Goal:** Infect all living players and become Pestilence.

**You are a patient killer with a knowledge of poisons.** 
You may choose to **poison** a player each night. 
 
Your poisons take **one day** to take effect. 
Poison can be **removed by Heals**. 
With the *Necronomicon*, your poison can **no longer be Healed**. 
 
**Goal:** Kill all who would oppose the Coven.

**You are an experienced alchemist with potent recipes for potions.** 
You may choose to **use a potion** on a player **each night**. 
 
You may choose to use a **Heal**, **Reveal**, or **Attack** potion on a player.  
Each potion has a **three day cooldown**. 
With the *Necronomicon*, your potions **no longer have a cooldown**. 
 
**Goal:** Kill all who would oppose the Coven.

**You are a powerful seer with a gift for finding one's secrets.** 
Receive a **vision** every night. 
 
On odd nights you will have a vision of three players -- at least one will be Evil. 
On even nights you will have a vision of two players -- at least one will be Good. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are a powerful mystic that can raise the true-hearted dead.** 
You may **raise a dead Town member** and **use their ability** on a player. 
 
Create **zombies** from **dead true-hearted Town players**. 
Use their abilities on your **second target**. 
Each zombie can be used **once** before it rots. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are a psychotic criminal who wants everyone to die.** 
You may choose to **attack a player** each night. 
 
If you are role blocked, you will **attack the role blocker in addition to your target**. 
Role blockers that target you will be mutilated, making their last will **unreadable**. 
You can choose to be **cautious** and **not kill role blockers**. 
 
**Goal:** Kill everyone who would oppose you.

**You are the law enforcer of the town forced into hiding from threat of murder.** 
**Interrogate** one person each night for **suspicious activity**. 
 
You will know if your target is **suspicious**. 
The **Godfather and Vampires** will appear **innocent** regardless. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are a talented watcher who keeps track of evil in the Town.** 
You may **bug** a player's house to **see what happens to them** that night. 
 
You will know who the **Mafia** and **Coven** visit each night. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are a neutral character who just wants to live.** 
Put on a **bulletproof vest** at night. 
 
Putting on a bulletproof vest gives you **Basic defense**. 
You can only use the bulletproof vest **4** times. 
 
**Goal:** Live until the end of the game, by any means necessary.

**You are a skilled tracker who will follow their prey to any destination.** 
**Track** one person at night to **see who they visit**. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**Your job is to transport people without asking any questions.** 
Choose two people to **transport** at night. 
 
Transporting two people **swaps all targets against them**. 
**You may transport yourself**. 
Your targets **will know** they were transported. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are an intelligent woodsman with a knack for traps.** 
You may **set up a Trap** at another player's house. 
 
Traps take **one day** to build, and only **one trap can be set** at once. 
Traps can be **torn down** by **selecting yourself** at night. 
If someone attacks your target, your trap will **ensnare them**, dealing a **Powerful attack** to one attacker. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are among the undead who want to turn others at night.** 
**Convert** others to Vampires at night. 
 
Vampires **vote at night** to **bite** a target. 
The youngest Vampire will **visit the target at night**. 
If they are a **Town member**, they will be **converted to a Vampire**. If not, they will be attacked with a **Basic attack**. 
 
**Goal:** Convert everyone who would oppose you.

**You will do whatever it takes to eliminate the Vampires.** 
**Check** for Vampires each night. 
 
If you visit a Vampire or a Vampire visits you, **you will attack them**. 
If all the Vampires die, you will become a Vigilante with two bullets. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are a paranoid war hero who will shoot anyone who visits you.** 
Decide if you will go on **alert**. 
 
While on alert, you gain **Basic Defense** and you will deliver a **Powerful attack** to **anyone who visits you**. 
You can only go on alert **3** times. 
You **cannot** be role blocked. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are a militant cop who takes the law into your own hands.** 
Choose to take justice into your own hands and **shoot someone**. 
 
If you **shoot another Town member**, you will **commit suicide** over the guilt. 
You can only shoot your gun **3** times. 
 
**Goal:** Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

**You are a normal citizen who transforms during the full moon.** 
Transform into a **Werewolf** during the full moon. 
 
You will **Rampage** at a player's house, attacking them and all their visitors. 
If you do not select a target, you will **stay home and Rampage at your home**. 
 
**Goal:** Kill everyone who would oppose you.

**You are a voodoo master who can control other people's actions.** 
You can **Control** someone each night. 
 
You have a mystical barrier that grants you **Basic defense until you are attacked**.  
You will **know the role** of the player you Control. 
**THIS ROLE IS UNAVAILABLE IF THERE IS A COVEN MEMBER IN THE GAME.** 
 
**Goal:** Survive to see the Town lose the game.
